tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE team_championships (
    team_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    championships_won INT NOT NULL,
    runner_up_finishes INT NOT NULL,
    playoff_appearances INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE team_championships (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(50),
    championships_won INT,
    runner_up_finishes INT,
    playoff_appearances INT
);

CREATE TABLE playoff_results (
    playoff_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    playoff_season VARCHAR(10),
    playoff_champion_team_id INT,
    playoff_runner_up_team_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (playoff_champion_team_id) REFERENCES team_championships(team_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (playoff_runner_up_team_id) REFERENCES team_championships(team_id)
);

CREATE TABLE playoff_stats (
    playoff_id INT,
    team_id INT,
    playoff_round INT,
    playoff_outcome VARCHAR(10),
    PRIMARY KEY (playoff_id, team_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (playoff_id) REFERENCES playoff_results(playoff_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES team_championships(team_id)
);
CREATE TABLE teams (id INT PRIMARY KEY, team_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, championships INT DEFAULT 0, runner_ups INT DEFAULT 0, playoff_appearances INT DEFAULT 0);
CREATE TABLE championships (id INT PRIMARY KEY, team_id INT, year INT, FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES teams(id));
CREATE TABLE runner_ups (id INT PRIMARY KEY, team_id INT, year INT, FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES teams(id));
CREATE TABLE playoff_appearances (id INT PRIMARY KEY, team_id INT, year INT, result VARCHAR(255), FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES teams(id));
CREATE TABLE seasons (id INT PRIMARY KEY, year INT, start_date DATE, end_date DATE);
